parameters.name: TFRS_RELEASE_TAG
parameters.description: The tag name for this release, sample value: v1.3.4

parameters.name: SCAN_COORDINATOR_IS_NAME
parameters.description: The scan coordinator image stream name, valid values: scan_coordinator and scan_coordinator_develop

source.dockerfile:
FROM golang:1.11
WORKDIR /go/src
RUN git clone https://github.com/bcgov/tfrs.git
WORKDIR /go/src/tfrs
RUN git checkout ${tfrs_release}
RUN cp -r /go/src/tfrs/security-scan/scan-coordinator /go/src
RUN rm -rf /go/src/tfrs
WORKDIR /go/src/scan-coordinator
ADD https://github.com/vishnubob/wait-for-it/compare/master...HEAD /dev/null
RUN git clone https://github.com/vishnubob/wait-for-it.git /wfi
RUN go get -d -v ./...
RUN go install -v ./...
CMD ["scan-coordinator"]
